description: This table maps driver assignment source IDs to their respective name (based on https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/master/go/src/samsaradev.io/platform/locationservices/driverassignment/driverassignmentsmodels/models.go)

schema.name: driver_assignment_source_id
schema.description: The id of the driver assignment source.

schema.name: driver_assignment_source
schema.description: The name of the driver assignment source.
